summary:
Teaching experience in philosophy, didactics of philosophy, general science, academic skills, social studies, Cambridge Global Perspectives and Research, physical geography, archaeology, evolutionary biology, paleoanthropology, graphic design, comparative religion.

Experience in museum management, exhibition design and construction.

Stage-managing, directing and presentation skills.

Graphic design, artistic and acting skills.

Professional goal: promoting and defending a humane, righteous and knowledgeable way of life - the Enlightenment way of life - by cultivating attention, a sense of wonder and competent, critical thinking.

Personal professional goal: ever getting better in doing the above.

Specialties: Teaching and lecturing, design and production of didactic materials, exhibition development, research journalism, interviews, article writing, poetry.
